summary:
Adds a NEW, two-handed Axe based on Shadowmourne from World of Warcraft.

Also includes a standalone retexture of Dragonplate, known as "Dragonsteel".

Comes with its own dungeon and boss fight! Also comes in 4k, 2k and 1k Resolutions.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/91r8Y9d.png[/img][/url][/center][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/lpH9pMI.jpg[/img][/center][center][youtube]UxMDyEoRLoI#t=2m44s[/youtube] [youtube]HiWfzUP8cYQ[/youtube] [youtube]Q_tob4LN7po[/youtube][/center]
[b]About:
[/b]
[b][color=#ff7700]Shadowmourne[/color][/b] is a legendary Two-handed Axe that was forged in mind-freezing temperatures using the souls it had once captured. It has been passed down to Death Knights who overcome numerous trials within the frozen lands of its origin. It is currently held by Highlord Darion who sits upon his lonely throne inside Icewind Hollow. It is there you must defeat him but beware, Shadowmourne has made him incredibly strong! So bring a follower...or 10 if you're VatiWah!

Appearance varies based on ENB Preset & Game Settings. My mods are ideally created for ENB. Also, you don't have to like World of Warcraft to use this! 

The [i]best[/i] way to fight with [b]Shadowmourne[/b], is to wait until Chaos Bane proc's, then unleash your Power Attacks for maximum deadly hits!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b][color=#ffff00]What this mod includes:[/color][/b] 

[b]Shadowmourne (Two-Handed)[/b]
[color=#999999]30 Base Damage - Has a 10% chance to cast Chaos Bane, which for 10 seconds, quadruples your current Attack Power. Also fills Soul Gems on low percentage!

[/color][b]Dragonsteel Armor[/b]
[color=#999999]A standalone retexture of the vanilla Dragonplate, Dragonsteel offers slightly higher defence due to being coated in liquid metal. Also craftable at the forge.[/color]

[center][b][color=#ff0000]Do NOT optimize the textures! Some maps are purposely uncompressed!

[/color][url=https://skfb.ly/KLFJ]View on Sketchfab![/url][/b][/center][color=#ff0000][b]
[/b][/color][img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Obtaining:[/b]

You must travel to Icewind Hollow which is south of Dawnstar. There you will adventure through a short dungeon and hopefully claim your own Shadowmourne!

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Q2ADqPs.jpg[/img][/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Installation:[/b]

Use Nexus Mod Manager

or

Extract the downloaded archive into your Skyrim Data Folder.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Uninstall Instructions:[/b]

Remove using Nexus Mod Manager

or

Simply delete the following files:

Shadowmourne - Johnskyrim.esp
Shadowmourne - Johnskyrim.bsa

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Questions:

[/b]Q. Wehn r u goin 2 maek Frustmorn?
A. I'll make Frostmourne when I'm good and ready. Probably over the summer :)

Q. Shadowmourne has fur, where is it?
A. Like Doomhammer, I decided to not include it as this is my own take on the weapon.

Q. Can you make this this this and this?
A. I might, but unlikely. Modding takes a long time.

Q. Can you make this do this?
A. No!

Q. What ENB are you using?
A. A modified Aeon ENB

Q. What mods are you working on/got planned?
A. Those are posted on my [url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][b]facebook[/b][/url] page!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Known Issues:[/b]

- Highlord Darion sometimes falls into the water on Death. Climb the icicles on the side to leave.
- Outer Glow effect is brighter in some situations, darker in other situations. Hard to find a balance.
- Dragonsteel Gauntlets clip through Orc's arms. Bethesda's fault.

Cleaned with TESVedit.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

If for some reason the files do not work, cause crashes
or any other problems, please do not hesitate to contact me.

All screenshots are taken directly from the game and resized down from 1920x1080 to 1280x720. No other editing has been done.

Thanks and I hope you enjoy this Skyrim Mod! [b]Remember, modding is stressful and we do it for free![/b]

PS. DO NOT UPLOAD THIS FILE ANYWHERE ELSE!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[center]
[url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/F9p2o48.png[/img]
